You and Rah head outside sleepily. Fireworks unravel in the sky above you two. People are lingering about the streets all around, in a tired and haphazard manner. You and Rah anxiously look around, but your drowsiness is hindering your senses. You can see the boat in the docks that was emitting all the light, being loaded by several workers dressed in purple. Rah spins around, struggling to stand upright.

"What if these fireworks are toxic..."Rah attempts to say, but before they can finish anything, they let out a massive yawn.

Investigate the commotion Stop the purplesuits from leaving
